document.topic_text: Westfield Police searching for woman with medical condition Police describe Halla as five feet tall, weighs 100 pounds August 11, 2016, 11:12 pm Updated: Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) Westfield Police are searching for Kristen Halla (Image Courtesy: Westfield Detective Bureau ) WESTFIELD, Mass. (WWLP) – Police in Westfield need the public’s help in finding a 24-year-old woman who hasn’t been seen since Monday, August 8th. According to the Westfield Detective Bureau Facebook page, Kristen Halla was reportedly last seen by a friend at a Taco Bell in Westfield. Police said she was seen in a white Chrysler Sebring, with an unknown man and woman; the man was driving. Police describe Halla as five feet tall, weighs 100 pounds, has brown hair and was last seen wearing ripped jeans, a black tank top and flip flops. Halla’s family told police she has a “medical condition that requires daily medication.” If you know where Halla is, you’re asked to call the Westfield Police Department at 413-562-5411 . Share this:
